name: Anomaly (MZ)
description:
Keep your eyes peeled!  Train and improve your sight over mind-bending game!  How to play:

- Just the left mouse button to click!

Notes:

- Initial game loading may not be visible. please refresh the page after a while for first time loading/playing if the game has not yet started.

- Game view port is intentionally set for mobile devices.

-This is a demo version. The complete game is uploaded in google play. ( soon in IOS)
